thread.title: The Best In Fashion On Bollywood Celebrity Instagram Last Week
thread.title_full: The Best In Fashion On Bollywood Celebrity Instagram Last Week

title: The Best In Fashion On Bollywood Celebrity Instagram Last Week
text:
289 SHARES 
Here's all the list-topping fashion from the leading ladies who -let's admit it - govern our wardrobes. 
1. Sonam Kapoor channelled her inner fall tree (literally decked in autumn flora) in a Ralph and Rusoo gown + overcoat combo, while on one of her endorsement-related tours. A photo posted by sonamkapoor (@sonamkapoor) on Jan 18, 2017 at 9:32pm PST 
2. Another Ralph and Russo gown was worn to perfection, this week. This time, by Deepika Padukone for one of her many premiers of XXX: The Movie . A photo posted by Shaleena (@shaleenanathani) on Jan 19, 2017 at 8:22pm PST 
3. Parineeti Chopra picked a chic Tommy Hilfiger trench dress for jetsetting, and made it look oh-s0-adorbale. A photo posted by @afashionistasdiaries on Jan 16, 2017 at 6:42am PST 
4. Taapsee Pannu prepared us for spring with her breezy Ritu Kumar dress, that she paired with tan oxford shoes and a mood-lifting smile. A photo posted by Devki B. (@devs213) on Jan 17, 2017 at 3:26am PST 
5. Tisca Chopra threw on a velvet jumpsuit for the red carpet, inspiring us to pull off a similar feat in our lives. A photo posted by @afashionistasdiaries on Jan 15, 2017 at 9:15am PST 
6. Karisma Kapoor stuck to her guns and picked a monochrome AM:PM outfit - a white dhoti and a black jacket - that had all the qualities of a wedding-ready ensemble. A photo posted by KK (@therealkarismakapoor) on Jan 16, 2017 at 3:20am PST 
7. Jacqueline Fernandez posed as the most stylish person at the airport, in a military jacket and a nude pair of heels. A photo posted by @afashionistasdiaries on Jan 18, 2017 at 10:27am PST 
8. Vaani Kapoor made a fresh case for metallic suits in a benarasi Payal Khandwala number. Let's just say this is best-suited (geddit) for when you need to make a cool-girl statement. A photo posted by @afashionistasdiaries on Jan 18, 2017 at 1:08am PST
